title: Annual Report of the Ohio State Board of Agriculture
aka: Annual Report of the Board of Agriculture of the State of Ohio
additional-note: Ohio's state agricultural agency has been known as the Department of Agriculture since 1921.  This record only covers the time period before that, when a Board of Agriculture was the state agency.  All of the Board's annual reports are old enough for any US copyrights to have expired.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
